detailsOfAchievement: Girls School was established in village in 1995 and reached upto 700 girls capacity by 2004 . Due to lack of fund , school could not make required infrastructure with in given time frame and result of the UP government had cancelled the recognition of the school. Since then we were trying to find some fund so that school can be reopened.Now there are some like minded people came together to contribute some money to re-start this school. Successfully got all formalities done to start the school

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Most of members of this society came together for the good social cause and wanted Education initiative which can help girls to provide quality education. We are also taking help of friends and relatives who are ready to donate fund for this cause
